%I A057674
%S A057674 3,2,5,13,29,61,109,251,509,1021,2029,4093,8179,16381,32749,65519,
%T A057674 131059,262139,524269,1048573,2097133,4194301,8388571,16777213,
%U A057674 33554371,67108859,134217649,268435367,536870909,1073741783,2147483629,4294967291,8589934513,17179869143
%V A057674 -3,2,5,13,29,61,109,251,509,1021,2029,4093,8179,16381,32749,65519,
%W A057674 131059,262139,524269,1048573,2097133,4194301,8388571,16777213,
%X A057674 33554371,67108859,134217649,268435367,536870909,1073741783,2147483629,4294967291,8589934513,17179869143
%N A057674 Primes -p+2^n with smallest p prime, arising in A057674.
%e A057674 n=1, 2^1=2. If 2,3,5 are subtracted from 2, then 0,-1 and -3 arise, of which -3 is a prime so a(1)=-3. n=11, 2048-p=q. At first p=29 gives the prime q=2029.
%Y A057674 Cf. A056206, A056208, A056662, A057674.
%K A057674 sign
%O A057674 0,1
%A A057674 _Labos Elemer_, Oct 19 2000
